org.robobrain.sdk.graphics
Class BitmapFont

java.lang.Object
  org.robobrain.sdk.graphics.BitmapFont

public class BitmapFont
extends java.lang.Object

Draws text to the screen via OpenGL

Author:
James Johnson

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

BitmapFont

public BitmapFont(Texture texture)
Initializes the Bitmap Font

Parameters:
texture - The Texture containing the font. It must be 16x16 units square and contain the first UTF-8 codepage in order.
Method Detail

drawChar

public void drawChar(GL10 gl,
                     char c,
                     float x,
                     float y)
Draws one character on the screen. Please note that the origin is at the characer's top left corner.

Parameters:
gl - A valid OpenGL ES 1.0 object.
c - The character to draw.
x - The position of the character on the X-Axis.
y - The position of the character on the Y-Axis.

drawString

public void drawString(GL10 gl,
                       java.lang.String s,
                       float x,
                       float y)
Draws a String to the screen. Please note that the origin is at the String's top left corner.

Parameters:
gl - A valid OpenGL ES 1.0 object.
s - The string to draw.
x - The position of the string on the X-Axis.
y - The position of the string on the Y-Axis.

begin

public void begin(GL10 gl)
Prepares the Font for drawing. Call this before any draw calls.

Parameters:
gl - A valid OpenGL ES 1.0 object.

end

public void end(GL10 gl)
Finishes drawing. Call after drawing text.

Parameters:
gl - A valid OpenGL ES 1.0 object.

setColor

public void setColor(Color c)
Set the text color.

Parameters:
c - The text color.

getColor

public Color getColor()
Gets the text color.

Returns:
The text color.
